name: Goat Murderer
description:
Synopsis

You are a robot

You have been dispatched by anti ghost HQ to eliminate the evil goat infestation inside the shitty dance party for some reason.

Fight back endless waves of... Goat... Ghosts? GhostyGoats kill you by touching you, so keep them at distance by sprinting around the map and shooting them with your... Anti-Ghost, matter-rayizozor

Features

  • Endless waves! Or well. Really until your computer can't handle the glowing goats
  • Glowing goats!
  • Imagination! Stimulate your imagination by pretending like the goats don't look like beavers
  • Flashing lights.. Actually, maybe if you're epileptic, you shouldn't play this...
  • Options menu! (It's just a bunch of static buttons shh)
  • Controller support! (Except for menus... Menus are tricky.)
  • One whole level!

Reviews

"It hurts my eyes" - Just about everyone over the age of 40

Disclaimer

I didn't really get into working on this until Saturday. We're going to pretend like the glowing white globs of poop look like goats, because I just couldn't make it happen on time. I'm no artist. And I don't pretend to be! But especially with zero time to actually make anything, this is what we get. :D
